title: Kerry McCarthy – 2021 Comments on Violent Protest in Bristol
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Kerry McCarthy, the Labour MP for Bristol East, on 21 March 2021.
content:
100% back [Marvin Rees on this](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/marvin-rees-2021-statement-on-violent-protest-in-bristol/); as he says, tonight runs the risk of damaging all the great work that’s been happening in the city, bringing people together, and plays into Priti Patel’s hands re Police Bill.
